mapper.sql: ID, PAY_PASSWORD, REGISTERED_TYPE, NAME, CREDENTIALS_TYPE, IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER, CERT_EXPIRY_DATE, COUNTRY_ID, IP, CITY_CODE, CITY_NAME, NICKNAME, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, MARITAL_STATUS, ETHNIC_GROUP, PARTY_AFFILIATION, BLOOD_TYPE, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, PROFESSION, INVESTMENT_EXP, ANNUAL_INCOME, STATUS, CERT_STATUS, CREATED_TIME, REG_CHAN_CODE,GENDER,INVESTMENT_EXP,COUNTRY_ID,PROFESSION
mapper.insert: insert into T_CUST_PERSON (ID, PAY_PASSWORD, REGISTERED_TYPE, NAME, CREDENTIALS_TYPE, IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER, CERT_EXPIRY_DATE, COUNTRY_ID, IP, CITY_CODE, CITY_NAME, NICKNAME, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, MARITAL_STATUS, ETHNIC_GROUP, PARTY_AFFILIATION, BLOOD_TYPE, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, PROFESSION, INVESTMENT_EXP, ANNUAL_INCOME, STATUS, CERT_STATUS, CREATED_TIME, REG_CHAN_CODE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registeredType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{credentialsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certExpiryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{countryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{maritalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ethnicGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyAffiliation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bloodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{weight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{investmentExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{annualIncome,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{regChanCode,jdbcType=CHAR} )

ID,

mapper.update:
update T_CUST_PERSON
PAY_PASSWORD = #{payPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTERED_TYPE = #{registeredType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDENTIALS_TYPE = #{credentialsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER = #{identityCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_EXPIRY_DATE = #{certExpiryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COUNTRY_ID = #{countryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_NAME = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MARITAL_STATUS = #{maritalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ETHNIC_GROUP = #{ethnicGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTY_AFFILIATION = #{partyAffiliation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BLOOD_TYPE = #{bloodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEIGHT = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=REAL},
PROFESSION = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVESTMENT_EXP = #{investmentExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANNUAL_INCOME = #{annualIncome,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_STATUS = #{certStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REG_CHAN_CODE = #{regChanCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_CUST_PERSON set PAY_PASSWORD = #{payPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTERED_TYPE = #{registeredType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREDENTIALS_TYPE = #{credentialsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER = #{identityCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERT_EXPIRY_DATE = #{certExpiryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COUNTRY_ID = #{countryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY_NAME = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MARITAL_STATUS = #{maritalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ETHNIC_GROUP = #{ethnicGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTY_AFFILIATION = #{partyAffiliation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BLOOD_TYPE = #{bloodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HEIGHT = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=REAL}, PROFESSION = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVESTMENT_EXP = #{investmentExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANNUAL_INCOME = #{annualIncome,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERT_STATUS = #{certStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REG_CHAN_CODE = #{regChanCode,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT u.LOGIN_NAME, u.PASSWORD, u.MOBILE, u.CUST_TYPE, u.REG_CHAN_CODE, u.LAST_UPDATE_PASSWORD_TIME, u.LAST_LOGIN_LOCK_TIME, p.ID, p.PAY_PASSWORD, p.REGISTERED_TYPE, p.NAME, p.CREDENTIALS_TYPE, p.IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER, p.CERT_EXPIRY_DATE, p.COUNTRY_ID, p.CITY_CODE, p.CITY_NAME, p.NICKNAME, p.GENDER, p.IP, p.BIRTHDAY, p.MARITAL_STATUS, p.ETHNIC_GROUP, p.PARTY_AFFILIATION, p.BLOOD_TYPE, p.HEIGHT, p.WEIGHT, p.PROFESSION, p.INVESTMENT_EXP, p.ANNUAL_INCOME, p.STATUS, p.CERT_STATUS, p.CREATED_TIME FROM T_CUST_PERSON p JOIN T_CUST_USER u ON u.CUST_ID = p.ID WHERE p.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(p.ID) from T_CUST_PERSON p JOIN T_CUST_USER u ON u.CUST_ID = p.ID
mapper.sql:
SELECT u.LOGIN_NAME, u.PASSWORD, u.MOBILE, u.CUST_TYPE, u.REG_CHAN_CODE, u.LAST_UPDATE_PASSWORD_TIME, u.LAST_LOGIN_LOCK_TIME, p.ID, p.PAY_PASSWORD, p.REGISTERED_TYPE, p.NAME, p.CREDENTIALS_TYPE, p.IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER, p.CERT_EXPIRY_DATE, p.COUNTRY_ID, p.CITY_CODE, p.CITY_NAME, p.NICKNAME, p.GENDER, p.IP, p.BIRTHDAY, p.MARITAL_STATUS, p.ETHNIC_GROUP, p.PARTY_AFFILIATION, p.BLOOD_TYPE, p.HEIGHT, p.WEIGHT, p.PROFESSION, p.INVESTMENT_EXP, p.ANNUAL_INCOME, p.STATUS, p.CERT_STATUS, p.CREATED_TIME FROM T_CUST_PERSON p JOIN T_CUST_USER u ON u.CUST_ID = p.ID
order by CREATED_TIME desc
mapper.select: SELECT a.reg_chan_code regChanCode, COUNT(a.reg_chan_code) num FROM (SELECT tcp.id, tcp.name, tcp.created_time, tcp.reg_chan_code FROM T_CUST_PERSON tcp) a GROUP BY a.reg_chan_code

SELECT a.reg_chan_code regChanCode, COUNT(a.reg_chan_code) num FROM
(SELECT tcp.id, tcp.name, tcp.created_time, tcp.reg_chan_code FROM T_CUST_PERSON tcp WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tcp.created_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m' )) a GROUP BY a.reg_chan_code

SELECT a.reg_chan_code regChanCode, COUNT(a.reg_chan_code) num FROM (SELECT tcp.id, tcp.name, tcp.created_time, tcp.reg_chan_code FROM T_CUST_PERSON tcp WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tcp.created_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m')) a GROUP BY a.reg_chan_code ;

SELECT a.reg_chan_code regChanCode, COUNT(a.reg_chan_code) num FROM
(SELECT tcp.id, tcp.name, tcp.created_time, tcp.reg_chan_code FROM T_CUST_PERSON tcp WHERE YEARWEEK( DATE_FORMAT(tcp.created_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ) = YEARWEEK(NOW())) a GROUP BY a.reg_chan_code
SELECT a.city_code cityCode, COUNT(a.city_code) num FROM (SELECT tcp.id, tcp.name, tcp.created_time, tcp.city_code FROM T_CUST_PERSON tcp) a GROUP BY a.city_code

SELECT a.city_code cityCode, COUNT(a.city_code) num FROM
(SELECT tcp.id, tcp.name, tcp.created_time, tcp.city_code FROM T_CUST_PERSON tcp WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tcp.created_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m' )) a GROUP BY a.city_code

SELECT a.city_code cityCode, COUNT(a.city_code) num FROM (SELECT tcp.id, tcp.name, tcp.created_time, tcp.city_code FROM T_CUST_PERSON tcp WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tcp.created_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m')) a GROUP BY a.city_code

SELECT a.city_code cityCode, COUNT(a.city_code) num FROM
(SELECT tcp.id, tcp.name, tcp.created_time, tcp.city_code FROM T_CUST_PERSON tcp WHERE YEARWEEK( DATE_FORMAT(tcp.created_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ) = YEARWEEK(NOW())) a GROUP BY a.city_code
